column1: Dunhir is a Dúnedain and the brother of Baranor (video game character) and uncle of Eradan (video game character). Although he doesnt make an actual appearance in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
column2: he is mentioned in the http://www.warinthenorth.com/the-game/heroes/backstory#dunedainAnchor backstory of Eradan.

column1: Dunhirs ancestors were members of a noble family from Númenor
column2: who were loyal to Elendil. After the Downfall of Númenor they went into exile to Middle-earth and served the Kings of Arnor in Arnor. He was a Rangers of the North and served Aragorn. After the death of Baranor (video game character)
